definition: Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning/north Hebei/the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436)/surname Yan

sentences.english: Later, when he was recovering, she made him appetising cups of beef-tea or gruel.
sentences.chinese: 后来他病好，又拿牛肉茶或是燕麦粥给他开胃。

sentences.english: My life was as 6）bland and boring as a bowl of 7）oatmeal.
sentences.chinese: 生活平静乏味得像碗燕麦粥。

sentences.english: The oatmeal may sound a little odd but trust me it's delicious.
sentences.chinese: 燕麦粥听起来有些奇怪，但请相信我，它非常可口。

sentences.english: I'd like Breakfast No. 3 and oatmeal.
I get us some oatmeal porridge and milk for morning.
sentences.chinese: 我给了我们一些燕麦粥和牛奶。

sentences.english: Whole grains like oatmeal and whole wheat bread are a must as well.
sentences.chinese: 全谷类产品类似燕麦粥和全麦面包也是必须的选择。

sentences.english: He had a bowl of oatmeal porridge for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 他早餐吃了一碗燕麦粥。

sentences.english: The vat of oatmeal stood gasping on the electric range.
sentences.chinese: 那一大桶燕麦粥在电炉上扑哧扑哧作响。

sentences.english: Examples of these foods are applesauce, bananas, white rice, oatmeal, and refined wheat bread.
sentences.chinese: 苹果酱，香蕉，精白米，燕麦粥以及精制小麦面包。
